block.p: GARDNER-Maurice. Of Miami Beach, FL, on Tuesday, February 26, 2002. Peacefully in Miami, FL. Devoted husband of Sadie Gardner, beloved father of Robert and Gerald, loving brother-in-law of Herbert Hauser, Pauline Tolmage and Helen Goldstein, adored uncle of Clifford, Jeffrey and the late Richard Hauser, dear brother of deceased brothers Joseph, Sidney, Milton Goldstein and deceased sister Beatty, and loving brotherin-law of Yetta Goldstein, and deceased Betty, Sidney, and Ruth Tolmage. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be sent to the individual's favorite charity.
